name: SonarCloud

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  build:
    name: SonarCloud
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Install build-wrapper
        run: |
          curl -sSLo build-wrapper-linux-x86.zip https://sonarcloud.io/static/cpp/build-wrapper-linux-x86.zip
          unzip build-wrapper-linux-x86.zip

      - name: Build with wrapper
        run: |
          ./build-wrapper-linux-x86/build-wrapper-linux-x86-64 --out-dir bw-output g++ -c main-cpp/*.cpp

      - name: SonarCloud Scan
        uses: SonarSource/sonarcloud-github-action@master
        with:
          projectKey: Volkovich81_nika2
          organization: Volkovich81
          token: ${{ secrets.SONAR_TOKEN }}
          args: >
            -Dsonar.sources=main-cpp
            -Dsonar.language=c++
            -Dsonar.cfamily.build-wrapper-output=bw-output
